description: Number of self-avoiding walks with n steps on square lattice.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: W. A. Beyer and M. B. Wells, Lower bound for the connective constant of a self-avoiding walk on a square lattice, J. Combin. Theory, A 13 (1972), 176-182.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
